message.content:
We have to determine the “interest income” by totaling the amounts of all transactions that have type “Interest Receivables.” (In our system these “interest receivable” entries are used to recognize interest income.) In the new problem the table lists a number of such transactions; we then sum their “amount” column.

Below we list each “Interest Receivables” transaction with its amount (units in “amount”):

• Interest20240101001: 1335.0  
• Interest20240102002: 1335.0  
• Interest20240103003: 1246.0  
• Interest20240104004: 1246.0  
• Interest20240105005: 1246.0  

• Interest20240106006: 1068.0  
• Interest20240107007: 1068.0  

• Interest20240108008: 801.0  

• Interest20240109009: 729.8  
• Interest20240110010: 729.8  
• Interest20240111011: 729.8  
• Interest20240112012: 729.8  
• Interest20240113013: 729.8  
• Interest20240114014: 729.8  

• Interest20240115015: 685.3  

• Interest20240116016: 418.3  
• Interest20240117017: 418.3  
• Interest20240118018: 418.3  
• Interest20240119019: 418.3  
• Interest20240120020: 418.3  
• Interest20240121021: 418.3  
• Interest20240122022: 418.3  
• Interest20240123023: 418.3  
• Interest20240124024: 418.3  
• Interest20240125025: 418.3  

• Interest20240126026: 275.9  
• Interest20240127027: 275.9  
• Interest20240128028: 275.9  
• Interest20240129029: 275.9  

• Interest20240130030: 186.9  
• Interest20240131031: 186.9  

• Interest20240201032: 97.9  
• Interest20240202033: 97.9  
• Interest20240203034: 97.9  
• Interest20240204035: 97.9  
• Interest20240205036: 97.9  

Now, we add them up step‐by‐step.

Step 1. Sum first five transactions:  
 1335.0 + 1335.0 = 2670.0  
 2670.0 + 1246.0 = 3916.0  
 3916.0 + 1246.0 = 5162.0  
 5162.0 + 1246.0 = 6408.0  

Step 2. Next two entries:  
 1068.0 + 1068.0 = 2136.0  
 Subtotal so far: 6408.0 + 2136.0 = 8544.0

Step 3. Add the next one:  
 8544.0 + 801.0 = 9345.0

Step 4. Next six transactions (each 729.8):  
 6 × 729.8 = 4378.8  
 Subtotal: 9345.0 + 4378.8 = 13723.8

Step 5. Then add 685.3:  
 13723.8 + 685.3 = 14409.1

Step 6. Next 10 transactions at 418.3 each:  
 10 × 418.3 = 4183.0  
 Subtotal: 14409.1 + 4183.0 = 18592.1

Step 7. Next 4 transactions at 275.9 each:  
 4 × 275.9 = 1103.6  
 Subtotal: 18592.1 + 1103.6 = 19695.7

Step 8. Next 2 transactions at 186.9 each:  
 2 × 186.9 = 373.8  
 Subtotal: 19695.7 + 373.8 = 20069.5

Step 9. Finally, 5 transactions at 97.9 each:  
 5 × 97.9 = 489.5  
 Final Total: 20069.5 + 489.5 = 20559.0

Thus the total interest income is 20559.0.

Presenting the answer as required:

